lead_paragraph: Oakland Raiders receiver Javon Walker remained hospitalized with a concussion and a battered face Tuesday, one day after he was beaten, robbed and left unconscious on a Las Vegas street after a night of partying. The police said a large amount of cash and some jewelry were taken from Walker, 29, who sustained a moderate concussion and significant injuries to his face.
